productInformation.value: #8,254 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #134 in Facial Cleansing Washes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Our highest customer rated. A foaming cleanser face wash for all skin types. Removes excess oil, makeup, and hydrates and refreshes skin. A perfect face wash for dry skin.
Key Benefits of SkinMedica Facial Cleanser Formulated for dry and sensitive skin. A perfect face wash for women with oily skin, dry skin, and help with makeup removal.
See why SkinMedica Facial Cleanser is right for you.
FACIAL CLEANSER CLEANS AND HYDRATES This foaming cleanser face wash not only washes away oil, dirt and impurities, but it leaves your skin feeling smooth and hydrated.

We Develop Products by Being Skin Experts Uncover What Your Skin Needs Our skin biologists and formulation scientists are constantly researching so we can continue to deliver innovative new products to meet a wide range of skin care needs. Cleanse Our cleansers remove dirt, and makeup, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and ready for treatments.

Previous page The Cleanse Factor Our cleansers range from gentle, daily-use to exfoliating and brightening. The Growth Factor Growth factors are made by skin cells to help maintain firmness and elasticity in your skin. The Correct Factor Our correcting products work powerfully to address your skin concerns. The Hydrate Factor Our exclusive hydrator is a powerful blend of 5 forms of hyaluronic acid. The Protect Factor Sunscreen is essential in fighting the visible signs of aging. Next page The SkinMedica Method 1 The Cleanse Factor 2 The Growth Factor 3 The Correct Factor 4 The Hydrate Factor 5 The Protect Factor

CAUTION: Do not use Retinol Complex if you are pregnant, lactating, or planning to become pregnant. Mild redness, peeling, and irritation are expected when using this product. Use a sunscreen and limit sun exposure while using this product and for a week following discontinuation. Sunburn alert: AHA/BHA Exfoliating Cleanser and AHA/BHA Cream contain an alpha-hydroxy acid (AHA) that may increase your skin’s sensitivity to the sun and particularly the possibility of sunburn. Use a sunscreen, wear protective clothing, and limit sun exposure while using these products and for a week following discontinuation. IMPORTANT! SUNSCREEN IS REQUIRED TO OPTIMIZE AND MAINTAIN THE RESULTS OF USING LYTERA 2.0 PIGMENT CORRECTING SERUM. Most SkinMedica products are intended to meet the FDA's definition of a cosmetic product, an article applied to the human body to cleanse, beautify, promote attractiveness, and alter appearances. These SkinMedica products are not intended to be drug products that diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease or condition. These products have not been approved by the FDA and the statements have not been evaluated by the FDA. SkinMedica Total Defense + Repair Broad Spectrum Sunscreens (SPF 34 and SPF 34 Tinted) and Essential Defense Broad Spectrum Sunscreens (Everyday Clear SPF 47, Mineral Shield Tinted SPF 32, and Mineral Shield SPF 35) are over-the-counter drug products which are formulated and marketed pursuant to FDA’s governing regulations set forth at 21 CFR Part 352. SkinMedica Purifying Foaming Wash is an over-the-counter drug product which is formulated and marketed pursuant to FDA’s governing regulations set forth at 21 CFR Part 333 Subpart D.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Have used multiple times
reviews.reviewText: Have bought many times. this is the only face soap I will use. Have extremely sensitive skin. Dr recommended it many years ago. Only need to use a small amount- it goes a long way. Recommend if you have sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exfoliating face cleanser
reviews.reviewText: Love this cleanser. My face feels so clean and you can see a difference

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sensitive skin and cleansing of my face
reviews.reviewText: I like that it cleans my skin when I use it to wash my face in the shower plus I have sensitive skin so it helps with my pimples in scars and that I can’t go anywhere without it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great facial cleanser
reviews.reviewText: I have been using skin medica for a while and it is a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 15, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my Husband as well.
reviews.reviewText: My Dermatologist recommended this about a year ago and I decided to purchase it here because the big price difference. This is Authentic I can tell from my others that I purchased from Dermatologist. I have no doubts at all about the Authenticity. This really cleans my face well ,rids all the oils and daily toxins that we get exposed to on a daily basis. It's gentle on the skin but delivers .For some reason or another my pores have gotten much ,much smaller and less noticeable. I am not sure if it's because of this face cleaner or the toner etc but either way I'm happy.In all honesty I love Image Skin care and will still use but I felt as though it was time to switch back to skin medica for a while.It's a toss up between the two brands but I'm leaning towards this brand more everyday since I have saw more positive changes to my skin.My Husband is now using this at my personal recommendation and it is very noticeable how his skin benifits from the short time he has been using.Like myself his pores are less noticeable and his complexion is nice.Hopefully he will keep on using this .After all men need a good skin care regiment as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face cleanser ever
reviews.reviewText: I have used numerous facial cleansers in my life, most high end products. This one is the best cleanser and skin protector of all. It doesn't get sudsy but cleanses beautifully. It prevents skin eruptions of all types. I recommend it highly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: LOVE the size of this item. Well worth the price and you’ll get long term use out of it before needing more. The consistency is a bit thick for my liking, almost like a gel. You need extra water to make it easier to lather your face and make it like a cleanser. Even so, I like how clean my skin feels very clean after use and it doesn’t cause any irritation.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product reasonable price

reviews.reviewText: I have used this product for years as it cleanses thoroughly leaving no mascara are any makeup behind.
